Description: Beautiful Goldburst Duesenberg Fairytale Lapsteel Guitar in "Like-New" ConditionPlayed briefly - couldn't warm up to the hand levers. Can get some very nice country/pedalsteel bends but I quickly realized it's more complexity than I want or will ever master. Going to stay with my old Oahu Tonemaster. "The Fairytale is a solid mahogany body Lapsteel Guitar in Goldburst laquer finish, featuring an integrated capodaster and Multibender bridge system, and dual pickup combination of new SingleTwin Domino hum-cancelling singlecoil and GrandVintage humbucker. The freely configurable Multibender is operated with the heel of the hand. Up to six levers (one per string) are mountable, which allow you to either raise or lower the notes on the individual strings to a preset setting. The integrated improved capo, which runs along a track on the anodized black aluminum fretboard, enables freedom of movement between all keys without sacrificing the typical lapsteel riffs and licks that rely on open strings. A roll nut provides tuning stability, while the Duesenberg GrandVintage humbucker and the SingleTwin Domino hum-cancelling singlecoil deliver great tone and transparency in any situation. And the Duesenberg Speed pot controls work with a path of just 70˚ in order to achieve the lapsteel’s typical swelling “wah” effects. BODY/NECK Wood: Korina (+ maple top on headstock) Width at nut: 65 mm / 2.56" Size: 94 x 19 x 4,2 cm / 37" x 7.48" x 1.65" Stringspacing: 54 mm / 2.13" Fingerboard: Black anodized aluminum Scale length: 648 mm / 25.5" Finish: Goldburst PUR lacquerELECTRONICS Pickup (neck): Duesenberg SingleTwin Domino Pickup (bridge): Duesenberg GrandVintage Humbucker Wiring: 1 volume, 1 tone, 3-way pickup selectorHARDWARE Tuners: Duesenberg Z-Tuners, "Art Diego" buttons Bridge: Duesenberg Multibender Hardware: Nickel color Strings: Duesenberg DSL16 (016-018-026-036-046-056) Open D tuning (D-A-D-F#-A-D)"
Title: Duesenberg Fairytale Lap Steel Guitar
Subtitle: Beautiful goldburst finish in "Like-New" condition
